Click the following link to watch video: https://share.newscasts.refinitiv.com/link?entryId=1_r4uswfoy&referenceId=1_r4uswfoy&pageId=RefinitivNewscasts
Source: Reuters

Description: Food giant Nestle grappling with higher costs and squeezed margins.The company has previously said price increases will lag some way behind rising input costs.Nestle has hedged against rising prices on some products - like coffee - but not on transportation costs.
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3Bnu1RM
